item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

I draw conclusions from everything.

A 120 year old woman in India says her secret to old age is smoking pot every day:
http://www.ncbuy.com/news/2006-12-04/1013670.html

It doesn’t prove anything, but from this I conclude that pot is the cats pajamas.

And cell-phones are not dangerous, but they have more of a detrimental effect on you than marijuana ever will.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

And I agree. Well, not so sure about cell-phones But in general, I agree, cannabis is safer than a lot of the thing everybody uses daily, and a lot more fun

However, drawing a definite conclusion from a single study is what the freevibe crew do - we are above that.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Mopman, Marijuana is the oldest medicine used by mankind, and millions of people smoke it everyday, it is less dangerous than modern man-made creations, such as automobiles or cell phones.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

There was indeed a study that showed THC may kill off mutating cells before they have a chance to become cancerous - however, please remember to include the “may”. While I believe the study is a real possibility, there hasn’t been enough evidence to say it definitely happens, which makes saying that it is definately true as bad as saying “cannabis is a gateway drug”. I can show “studies” that “prove” that too - they’re just written by people who don’t know what they’re talking about.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

PaulT:

Marijuana actually helps prevent cancer. Though it does contain more carcinogens than tobacco, in the long run it acts to suppress tumor growth and heavy lifelong users have lower cancer rates than control groups.

Yeah I heard the before. I think I remember something about how it also clears out some tubes to your lungs or something like that, although I have no source to back it up.

Read full topic

ok, how do i get rid of the smell of smoke?i put axe on me but i can still smell that nasty smell… :eek:
anyone knows?

Woah sounds mischevious… you shouldnt smoke really, you’ll become very unfit and lazy. But the answer is simple, go to your nearest fast food (preferbly mcdonalds) and take a meal. if that doesnt work then use deoderant.[/quote]
yes, i noticed i became allot more lazy and unfit…maybe it’s better i quit

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

The only test proved to show that OD on marijuana is possible, is when they suffocated monkeys with 40,000 times more smoke then what is needed to get high.

Risk of cancer? Yes, but probably the same risk as walking downtown to get some brunch.

Marijuana has about 4 times more tar then a cigerette. Don’t forget, you dont smoke 15 joints a day. Some people smoke 1 a day, some do 1 a month. And almost all of that tar can be filtered out with a bong if your really worried about it.

Smoking weed causes no harm to anyone. It’s a human right, and the laws all break out rights of freedom. So fuck the law, lets all go get high.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @Hellfish Hellfish
item.description:
@Hellfish wrote:

[quote=“Skating On Java, post:110, topic:36833”][quote author=k00dr link=topic=52362.msg655253#msg655253 date=1166649640]

Laws are fucked up. Weed is illegal and you can’t even die of weed. Cigarettes are legal but you can die from them! So WTF!

Yeah, stealing is illegal and you can’t die of that either. That’s fucked up, stealing should be legal.
[/quote]

Any form of smoking can kill you. A high overdose of weed, And for smoking = Lung cancer.[/quote]
WTF. You can’t OD on weed read the American Death stat thing about deaths. It said:
Deaths By Marijuana: 0

EDIT: ^^ Beat me to it.

Read full topic

item.title: Smo0o0o0ke
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“Skating On Java, post:110, topic:36833”][quote author=k00dr link=topic=52362.msg655253#msg655253 date=1166649640]

Laws are fucked up. Weed is illegal and you can’t even die of weed. Cigarettes are legal but you can die from them! So WTF!

Yeah, stealing is illegal and you can’t die of that either. That’s fucked up, stealing should be legal.
[/quote]

Any form of smoking can kill you. A high overdose of weed, And for smoking = Lung cancer.[/quote]

It’s physically impossible to consume enough weed to overdose on THC. As for “any form of smoking can kill you”, where is your evidence to support this?
